title: Omaze Fund-Rasier
body:
So first of all not sure if there is a better place to put this, I've checked the support of riot and nothing really seemed to fit this. 

I was curious as to how Omaze knows our Riot In-Game names for League since if you donate $5 or over you get a icon for your profile, though I didn't see a place when paying to put your Game name. 


Thanks!

EDIT: Fixed!

replies.body:
As far as I'm aware, you'll get an email with more information regarding redeeming the Icon to your account.

If you have any further questions, feel free to contact [Omaze](https://www.omaze.com/) directly.
I recieved an Email from them about this, Thank you!
Just as a heads up, since I put in an inquiry with them, they may not email you until after the fundraiser ends, which is the beginning of November.
